exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="28"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
    <e:Group id="group_background" cacheAsBitmap="true">
					
	</e:Group>
    <e:Button id="btn_menu" x="140" anchorOffsetX="15" width="60" height="60" anchorOffsetY="15" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
            <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="setting_menu_png"
             source.down="setting_menu_png"/>
        </e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" x="250" anchorOffsetX="15" width="60" height="60" anchorOffsetY="15" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
            <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="home_png"
             source.down="home_png"/>
        </e:Skin>
	</e:Button>

	<e:Group id="group_chessGroup" >
					
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneIndexSkin" width="720" height="1200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" source="index_background_png"  anchorOffsetX="0"  verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_start" x="270" y="316" label="两人对战" anchorOffsetX="0" width="180" anchorOffsetY="0" height="66"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_about" label="关于" x="270" y="430" anchorOffsetX="0" width="180" anchorOffsetY="0" height="58"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="200">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="140" fillAlpha="1" fillColor="0x79DCFF" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" text="游戏结束" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="95%" height="110" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                <e:Label text="" id="label_content" width="80%" size="36" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff"
                          lineSpacing="10" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textAlign="center"></e:Label>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AboutViewSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.2" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="490">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="430" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" text="关于" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="95%" height="400" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                <e:Label id="label_content" width="100%" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" text=""
                          lineSpacing="10"></e:Label>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SettingSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.1" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="660" height="330">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="330" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Group width="650" height="300" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
            <e:Button id="btn_start" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="start_icon_png" source.down="start_icon_png" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="重新开始" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:Button>
            <e:Button id="btn_rule" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="text_icon_png" source.down="text_icon_png" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="规则" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:Button>
            <e:Button id="btn_statistics" width="150" height="150">
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image top="5" width="110" height="110" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" horizontalCenter="0"
                             alpha.disabled="0.5" source="statistics_icon_png" source.down="statistics_icon_png" />
                    <e:Label bottom="0" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei"
                             textColor="0xF9B683" size="32" text="战况统计" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:Button>
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout orientation="rows" requestedRowCount="2" requestedColumnCount="4" verticalAlign="middle"
                              horizontalAlign="center"  rowHeight="150" columnWidth="150" columnAlign="left" rowAlign="justifyUsingGap" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0"/>
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RuleViewSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.1" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="660">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="600" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" text="游戏规则" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="96%" height="570" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%" cacheAsBitmap="true">
                <e:Label id="label_rule" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" width="100%" 
                         lineSpacing="10" size="28"></e:Label>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StartSettingViewSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.1" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="360">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="300" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" text="开始游戏" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="96%" height="270" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%">
                <e:Image source="ask_icon_png" width="70" height="70" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="10" y="5"/>
                <e:Label text="确定要重新开始?" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" textColor="0xffffff" width="80%"
                         lineSpacing="10" size="28" horizontalCenter="28" y="25"></e:Label>
                <e:Button id="btn_ok" x="186" y="194" height="60"  label="确定"/>
                <e:Button id="btn_cancel" x="367" y="194" height="60"  label="取消"/>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StatisticsSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect_mask" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" fillAlpha="0.1" locked="true" />
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="98%" height="490">
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="60" fillAlpha="0.9" fillColor="0xeeeeee" top="0" />
        <e:Rect width="100%" height="430" fillAlpha="0.8" fillColor="0x000000" bottom="0" />
        <e:Label height="60" width="180" text="战况统计" x="20" y="0" textColor="0x000000" textAlign="left"
                 verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" />
        <e:Scroller width="95%" height="400" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15">
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                <e:Label y="0" id="red_title_label" width="100%" height="50" bold="true" textColor="0xffffff"
                         textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" />
                <e:Label y="65" id="red_content_label" width="100%" height="135" textColor="0xFF9000" text=""
                         lineSpacing="20" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" multiline="true" wordWrap="true" />
                <e:Label y="200" id="blue_title_label" width="100%" height="50" bold="true" textColor="0xffffff"
                         textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" />
                <e:Label y="265" id="blue_content_label" width="100%" height="135" textColor="0x0000ff" text=""
                         lineSpacing="20" fontFamily="Microsoft Yahei" multiline="true" wordWrap="true"
                         verticalAlign="top" />
            </e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>
